titleStmt.title: An exact list of the French army in Flanders, commanded by the Duke of Luxemburg; who acts the defensive part against the confederate army, commanded by the King of Great Britain. As it was drawn up in two lines at Brain la Compte, June 21. 1691 S.N. Licens'd, June 17th. 1691 James Fraiser.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Hayhurst, at the Axe in Little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Copy catalogued is torn at edge with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
